about_the_game:
Haley and her friend Lucia have been trapped inside Haley's mind and are trying to get out! Finding The Dreamcutter, a mysterious scythe with an ulterior motive, promises sexy rewards and a chance at escape. What strange dangers and exotic encounters will you find inside your own mind?

No lewd game before has been this smooth!

-Stylish, Satisfying Combat System!
+ Combo meter to rack up points and win coins for upgrades
+ High combos mean faster movement speed!
+ Scythe can be thrown and returned to keep combos going
+ Send enemies flying far away or up in the air!

-Unique Movement Options!
+ Stick your scythe in the wall and use it to bounce!
+ Swinging, Rail, Bounce, Floating, and Wall Jump options for versatile movement and platforming
+ Experiment with your scythe! See what you can do and where you can go!

TAKE BACK YOUR MIND AND BODY

DREAMCUTTER

content_descriptors.notes:
Dreamcutter contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Nudity (Full Frontal, suggesting and partial)
-Sex Scenes (Consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-All characters in Dreamcutter are 18+ and over

name: Dreamcutter Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
